alert.note: Alert for Magoffin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 28 at 8:33AM EDT until July 28 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky... Licking River near Salyersville affecting Magoffin County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Licking River near Salyersville. * WHEN...From this morning to late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 15.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 16.8 feet late this morning. It will then fall to 10.4 feet this evening. - Action stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you are in the advisory area, remain alert to possible flooding or the possibility of the advisory being upgraded to a warning. The next statement will be issued 2 PM.
